name: AuthenticatorAssertionResponse.signature
description: The signature read-only property of the AuthenticatorAssertionResponse interface is an ArrayBuffer object which is the signature of the authenticator for both AuthenticatorAssertionResponse.authenticatorData and a SHA-256 hash of the client data (AuthenticatorAssertionResponse.clientDataJSON).

refs.name: Web Authentication: An API for accessing Public Key Credentials Level 1
refs.description: signature - Web Authentication: An API for accessing Public Key Credentials Level 1
